EmailTemplate.subject: Direct-To March Aviation Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.honeywellanalytics.com]]> Special Feature: Inside the FMS VNAV Logic For those operating Next Generation FMS-equipped airplanes, there are many changes to the VNAV architecture that add functionality while making the system more intuitive. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/connected-aircraft/business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Lead Field Service Engineer Bill Nelson Knows Avionics He helps operators get the most out of their Honeywell avionics systems. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2019/12/field-service-engineer-knows-fms?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Pilot Section Global Customer Committee (GCC) News: PC-12 NG Success Story The newly released LDI lessens premature filling of the Fault History Database and generation of the “MAINT MEMORY FULL” CAS message... Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/03/gcc-news?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
ATC Log Management: Message Retention Logic on G450/G550 Honeywell Engineering explains how ATC Log Management Logic works... Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/03/inside-the-fms-atc-log?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Flight Bag Pro Changes: Latest Improvements and Upgrades The Honeywell ForgeTeam is excited to announce several improvements and changes to the Flight Bag Pro app... Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/news/2020/03/flight-bag-pro-changes?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Maintenance Section End of Life Notice Operators of FMZ-2000 FMS aircraft who haven’t upgraded to FMS 6.1 will experience a price increase. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/cockpit-systems-and-displays/fmz-2000-version-6-1-upgrade?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
Expanded Maintenance Capabilities in Central Europe Agreement with Jet Maintenance Solutions provides support to Honeywell customers in the region, saving operators money, boosting efficiency and reducing downtime. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/press-release/2020/02/hon-expands-maintenance-services?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
HGT400 APU Excels with Performance and Reliability If your passengers are comfortable and content on the tarmac, and maintenance team is happy with reliability... Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/products/auxiliary-power-units/hgt400-auxiliary-power-unit?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> Need That Hard-to-Find Part? Honeywell Aerospace Trading Honeywell Aerospace Trading specializing in Honeywell & non-Honeywell certified pre-owned parts for most aerospace platforms. Read more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/services/honeywell-aerospace-trading?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]>
GoDirect Trade Honeywell’s GoDirect Trade is a unique online marketplace that brings together buyers and sellers within the aerospace industry in an intuitive and easy way. Read more <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/connected-aircraft/business-aviation?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=20_godirect&utm_content=direct-to-newsletter]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]> © 2020 Honeywell International Inc. <[[http://www.honeywell.com/terms-conditions]]> 115 Tabor Road, Morris Plains, NJ 07950
This message was sent to {{lead.Email Address:default=NA}}. If you don't want to receive these emails from Honeywell in the future, you can edit your profile or unsubscribe <[[https://explore.honeywell.com/Unsubscribepage.html]]>
